channel.title: Loading faster
channel.description: My client takes around 11 minutes to load.. and i wont get new players because nobody waits for it to load, can anyone help me rep++

item.title: Loading faster
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Either do the above (which is recommended by most), or you will have to create a new an efficient way of loading… in this case, preloading is a very bad idea because of the amount of files being loaded, so I highly suggest that you either move on from 600+ caches or learn how to cache pack the files, which will decrease he loading time.

Read full topic

item.title: Loading faster
item.dc:creator: @Trebel Trebel
item.description:
@Trebel wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:3, topic:437855”][quote author=Lil wayne fan link=topic=540573.msg3958983#msg3958983 date=1333070177]
My client takes around 11 minutes to load… and i wont get new players because nobody waits for it to load, can anyone help me rep++
[/quote]
Stop using shitty PI’s loading 600+ with tuns of customs
problem solved[/quote]

lol, yep.

Read full topic
